snippet: Rafael Nadal knows only too well what it's like to miss out on playing at the Olympics, hence he does not understand why so many of his fellow tennis professionals are turning their backs on the Rio Games in August....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal knows only too well what it's like to miss out on playing at the Olympics, hence he does not understand why so many of his fellow tennis professionals are turning their backs on the Rio Games in August.

headline.print_headline: Tennis-Nadal Baffled by Tennis No Shows at Olympics
headline.main: Tennis-Nadal Baffled by Tennis No Shows at Olympics
